name: Cyber Heist
description:
You are Nee-Oh the great hacker. Cyboar Corp. has made much money with dark deeds. It's about time to ask for a refund. Just the right job for YOU.

***

A skill game with some action elements. Move with cursor keys. Try to hack the numbers matching with the pattern. To do this, move over a disc when the matching number is displayed. Cells with a asterisks resets the hacked code and threat level. Use bombs to get rid of drones chasing you. Collect the key and grab as much cyber coins as possible, repeat. Now with fullscreen mode: press F.

***

Made for the cyberpunk game jam 2014 with Construct 2.

***

Music by Zanzlanz - http://zanzlanz.newgrounds.com/
